      • setupBillboard

        public static void setupBillboard(net.minecraft.entity.Entity entity,
                                  float partialTicks,
                                  float scaleFactor)
        Applies transformations such that the Z axis faces directly towards the player and (0, 0) is translated to above entity's head.

        This is similar to the method used to render player names, but any functionality can be implemented.

        Parameters:
        entity - The target entity.
        partialTicks - Partial ticks.
        scaleFactor - Linearly affects the size of things drawn to the billboard.
        See Also:
        EntityRenderer.drawNameplate(net.minecraft.client.gui.FontRenderer, String, float, float, float, int, float, float, boolean, boolean)

      • drawProgressBar

        public static void drawProgressBar(QuadBuilder background,
                                   QuadBuilder foreground,
                                   float progress,
                                   Direction direction,
                                   boolean rescaleTexture)
        Draws a progress bar with quads.
        Parameters:
        background - The background quad to draw
        foreground - The foreground quad to partially draw
        progress - Index of progress between 0 and 1
        direction - The direction the bar should fill up in
        rescaleTexture - true to maintain the aspect ratio of the scaled foreground texture

      • getStringSize

        public static Point getStringSize(java.lang.String string)
        Calculates the size of text on screen.
        Parameters:
        string - The text.
        Returns:
        The size of string as rendered by Minecraft's font renderer.

                              Direction alignment,

        Parameters:

        The bounds of the text.
